mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_item(order_itemno, memberno, order_payno, productid, cnt, tot, stateno, rdate) VALUES (order_item_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{order_payno}, #{productid}, #{cnt}, #{tot}, #{stateno}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT i.order_itemno, i.memberno, i.order_payno, i.productid, i.cnt, i.tot, i.stateno, i.rdate, c.pname, c.price FROM order_item i, products c WHERE (i.productid = c.productid) AND order_payno=#{order_payno} AND memberno = #{memberno} ORDER BY order_itemno DESC
